projectPurpose: To help users clean up computer storage by identifying and removing various types of redundant, unnecessary, or problematic files and directories efficiently and privately across multiple platforms.
mainFeatures: Finds duplicate files (by name, size, hash, or partial hash)
Finds empty folders and files
Finds similar images, videos, and music
Finds big files and temporary files
Finds invalid symbolic links, broken files, and bad extensions
Fast scanning using multithreading and caching
Cross-platform compatibility (Linux, Windows, macOS, FreeBSD)
Open Source and free with no ads or spying
Provides both CLI and GUI interfaces

alternatives.name: dupeGuru
mainFeatures: Finds duplicate files by content or filename
Fuzzy matching for similar filenames
Special modes for Music and Picture scanning
Customizable matching engine
Safe deletion with reference directories

alternatives.name: Duplicate Cleaner Pro
mainFeatures: Finds duplicate files (documents, photos, music, video)
Advanced similar image detection (resized, rotated, edited)
Finds duplicate folders and unique files
Scans inside zip files
Various scan modes (Regular, Image, Audio, Video)

alternatives.name: VisiPics
mainFeatures: Finds duplicate and similar images
Uses multiple comparison methods (hash, pixel, feature)
Adjustable similarity levels
Side-by-side image preview
Supports major image formats

alternatives.name: FSlint
mainFeatures: Finds duplicate files (using md5sum and sha1sum)
Finds empty directories
Finds problematic filenames and bad symlinks
Includes tools for temporary files and non-stripped binaries
Offers both GUI and command-line interfaces

alternatives.name: AllDup
mainFeatures: Finds duplicate files of any type
Compares files by content, name, extension, dates, or attributes
Fast search algorithm
Supports multiple search locations (folders, drives, network shares)
Provides detailed results and options for handling duplicates

marketPositioning: Czkawka is positioned as a comprehensive, high-performance, and privacy-focused free and open-source disk cleanup utility. It differentiates itself by offering a wide array of cleaning tools (beyond just exact duplicates to include similar media, broken files, etc.) within a single application, its speed due to being written in Rust with multithreading, and its broad cross-platform support. It competes with both specialized duplicate/similar file finders and more general system optimization tools by providing a versatile and transparent solution for freeing up disk space and organizing files without cost or privacy concerns.
